svg.style: font-family:Lato, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, 'Liberation Sans', sans-serif;font-feature-settings:"liga", "kern", "calt", "lnum";text-rendering:geometricPrecision;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;font-size:18px;background-color:#ffffff

a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Female labor force participation rate: 1980 vs. 2023
Share of the female working-age population who are economically active (employed or unemployed). Figures

refer to
national estimates
and may not be fully comparable across countries.
Female labor force participation rate in 2023
Female labor force participation rate in 1980
Data source: Labour Force Statistics (LFS) ILOSTAT, via World Bank (2025)
Note: Employment is defined in line with the 13th ICLS and includes the production of goods for own use, such as subsistence farming.
